newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean 3-yr bond yields end flat, CD yields fall.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean 3-yr bond yields end flat, CD yields fall.

text.p: Yields on three-year benchmark corporate bonds closed even on Monday after a slight fall in early trading, brokers said.
Institutions fearing that the yields may rebound in the near term stayed away from the market in the afternoon, they said.
Three-month certificates of deposit yields dropped while overnight call rates stood flat.
* 3-mth CDs end at 13.20 pct vs Saturday's 13.30 pct
* Overnight average call rates unchanged at 12.5 pct
